short_summary: Collection, codification, validation and filing of statistical records
description: The services of a firm to collect, code, validate, and file forms for each of the three maritime areas covered by the Department: Gaspésie-Bas-St-Laurent, the Magdalen Islands, and the North-Shore.
full_summary:
### Collection, Codification, Validation and Filing of Statistical Records

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference**: PW-23-01021566
* **Amendment Number**: None
* **Solicitation Number**: 30003767
* **Publication Date**: 2023-01-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-09T12:00:00 (Closed, this tender is no longer active)
* **End of Contract Date**: Not specified

#### Description of Work
The purpose of this tender is to collect, code, validate, and file statistical records for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO). The records will be processed for three maritime areas: Gaspésie-Bas-St-Laurent (Gaspésie), Magdalen Islands, and North-Shore. The contract period will be from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024.

#### Security Requirements

Bidders must hold a valid organization security clearance and meet specific security requirements outlined in the contract. The terms of the security clearance must be met prior to contract award. Reference to the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada for more information is required.

#### Contact Information
For additional information, please contact:
* **Sara Gould**
* **Phone**: Not Provided
* **Email**: [Sara.Gould@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Sara.Gould@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* **Address**: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1A 0E6

* The Request for Proposal(RFP) document can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/b9a24b4bca95d5e7fb0b3bfc13588b5c/30003767_-_rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/b9a24b4bca95d5e7fb0b3bfc13588b5c/30003767_-_rfp.pdf)
* The Demandeur de propositions(DDP) document can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/16/419dfad38b47d8da502bd36a
